text: Omo yo, hontōni watashi-tachi wa “anata gata no omo o shinkō shi nasai. ” To shinkō ni yobu mono no yobigoe o aite, shinkō ni hairimashita. Omo yo, watashi-tachi no tsumi o yurusa rete, subete no zaigō o watashi-tachi kara masshō shite, shinkō no tassei-sha-tachi to issho ni anata ni meshite kudasai
